head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SHERIDAN, MARGARET FAY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SHERIDAN, MARGARET FAY

block.p: SHERIDAN-Margaret Fay (nee Hanson). Loving mother of Joy Burke, Laurel Wendell and Holly Hansen. Devoted daughter of Margaret and grandmother of Kristin, Rebecca and David. Niece of Hannah, Joyce, Marta and Mildred. Daughter-in-law of Elizabeth. Memorial celebration at Oelker and Cox Funeral Home, 262 Main Street, Mount Kisco, on Sunday, June 25th, at 2 P.M. In lieu of flowers please donate to your local hospice.
